nodes.text: The Cave of Truth was a cave on Teya IV. It was meant to test a young Jedi student on their fear, impatience, anger and physical limits. For over 600 years Willm Lywin guarded the cave and brought students to it. Vici Ramunee made a successful trip through the cave during the Great Sith War as part of her training at the Teyan Praxeum.
